glsa.title: Dia: Arbitrary code execution through SVG import
glsa.synopsis: Improperly sanitised data in Dia allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: Dia is a gtk+ based diagram creation program released under the GPL license.

description.p: Joxean Koret discovered that the SVG import plugin in Dia fails to properly sanitise data read from an SVG file.

impact.p: An attacker could create a specially crafted SVG file, which, when imported into Dia, could lead to the execution of arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Dia users should upgrade to the latest version:
